DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the pharmacokinetics in subjects with severe renal insufficiency and healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Certoparin in Subjects With Renal Insufficiency and Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy subjects OR Subjects with severe renal insufficiency Exclusion criteria: Hypersensitivity to study medication Genetic abnormality or disease of clotting system Prior major surgery or bleeding Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
